website_summaries.verdict: A straightforward elevated feeding system with extra height that effectively reduces joint strain while keeping eating areas neat and tidy.
pros: A bit taller than most, making it a good choice for larger breeds or dogs with joint problems
Cute design with bone-shaped cut outs for easy handling
Comes with stick-on foam bumpers to keep bowls from rattling
cons: The stainless steel bowls and plastic legs feel somewhat flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Labradoodle approves! 🐕
customer_reviews.text: I have a labradoodle and this is perfect height for him. He's pretty tall. It's sturdy and looks nice. My mini pig kept getting into my dogs bowl and now she can't reach. She's not happy about this purchase. Lol.. Harley (labradoodle) looks comfortable while eating. With his last bowl he had to bend down. This is perfect. Like he has his own table instead of eating off of the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected if not better!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our new 4 year old Rottie. She's a pretty big girl. I ordered an XL size & the bowls actually ended up being quite bigger than I imagined, which is fine. Probably should be used for dogs bigger than a Rottweiler (ex. Great Dane, etc) But the height of the stand is great for her. Also came with some pretty nifty "sound barrier" strips to avoid that "rattling" of the bowls when the dogs are eating. Haven't applied them yet but its a cool concept!
customer_reviews.author: jkmen5

customer_reviews.title: I love it, especially the bowl size!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. The height is perfect for our 10 year old German shepherd lab mix. I tested out different heights for her at an over-priced pet store, then searched Amazon :-). At first she was hesitant at the height, but with treats and praise she opened up to it. The price is very fair for the quality. It is sturdy and light. I absolutely love the size of the bowls. They are huge! It's perfect for the amount of water she drinks daily. I am very happy with this dish, I don't know why I waited so long to get my baby girl one.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Writes

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase-Easy & Durable
customer_reviews.text: Our tripawd rescue, Pretzel (pittie mix), uses this easily. He lost his front left leg and shoulder last month after being shot at close range. We rescued him last week and the rescue organization suggested elevated dishes to help him maintain his balance and avoid more uncomfortable mealtimes. This fit the bill. It was inexpensive and came assembled with two big silver dishes included. The dishes are very easy to remove and clean. I am having trouble removing the big advertising stickers on each side of the base, but eventually with some GooGone they will be off.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Powers

customer_reviews.title: High Enough for Large Dogs so They Don't Choke, Stylish, Dishes Come Out To Clean in the Dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for larger dogs who need elevated dishes so they don't choke. After we lost our last greyhound, we began fostering and the foster family that took back our foster dog wanted to buy it from us, and we said "No Way" because we liked it so much and we knew we would get another large dog at some point. Dishes come out and can be put in the dishwasher. Attractive, too.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Why so sticky?!
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is nice. The XL is huge. I have a pitbull & really should have gotten the L. It seems stable so you don't have to worry about knocking it over and wide so there is less mess from your chaotic water drinkers. My reason for two stars is that there was tape keeping components together all over the metal bowls. Just attempting to remove the stickiness & residue has proven to be an Olympic - worthy event in itself (goo gone, soap, maybe a jackhammer next, etc). Not so sure the product is worth the headache of the packaging if it's this hard just to use the bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Amira

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a solid product
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy and will do the job. One thing though that really irked me, is that they put some scotch tape inside the stainless steel bowls, and it is so hard to remove the backing. I had to scrub hard with an SOS steel wool pad to get it off. What genius thought of that? You don't need to be a Harvard grad to know that this will happen.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Enormous. Make sure you have the space.
customer_reviews.text: Size XL This thing is enormous! Certainly works fine but it is much bigger and bulkier than appears in photos. Pay attention to the dimentions. If you have a large space where you feed you dog this will be fine. We could not find a spot in our kitchen that worked. Kids would run into it and spill water. Ended up getting the smaller size which works better for us but is MUCH smaller. Wanted to return the XL but the shipping back is more than the return so no point returning it. If you have space for this monster I’m sure you will like it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Billoni

customer_reviews.title: I’d like to give a better rating however don’t feel it’s ...
customer_reviews.text: I’d like to give a better rating however don’t feel it’s deserved. I was excited to receive this product however it has left me somewhat disappointed. It’s ok and serves its purpose however it’s made of a flimsy plastic and the dishes are very cheaply made. Very! I’m hoping I can find replacement dishes that fit the opening to the stand. Besides the fact that these dishes are junk, they were loaded with tape and the residue will NOT come off at all! So now they look even worse. I don’t feel like returning it because the height is perfect for my growing puppy. I just wish I would have made a better selection.
customer_reviews.author: DLH-PA

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for Big Dogs!
customer_reviews.text: First of all - it’s huge! It works perfectly for my 85 lb. Boxadors. I felt bad that they had to bend down to drink and eat so I had to find a tall enough option that didn’t have small bowls. This was my first choice and the best one I could have made. Amazon shipped it in a GIANT (I’m 5’0 and I can hide behind the package) box fully put together. We have had zero issues cleaning to and they have adjusted well to it. Highly recommend for big dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Too much tape on inside of bowls
customer_reviews.text: While these are very nice, I’m not happy with the scotch tape that was used to secure the padding for the legs. The tape is on the inside of the bowls and I can’t get the residue off. I will not feed my dogs with these bowls and will have to buy replacements. Note to vendor - do not use tape on the inside of the bowls! Also, would be nice if they had a size that was in between the XL and Medium. The medium is too short for my dogs and XL is too big. Kind of a waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia H

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with the quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: While searching for a taller feeding system for our dog, we purchased this one after reading several reviews. Arrived fully assembled and I am impressed with the quality. Sturdy plastic, which can easily be hosed down or cleaned in a large sink. Large bowls, which rest easily inside. They slip out easily enough to refill without spilling contents. Our weird dog was initially afraid to approach the bowls but he seems to get less "hiccups" after he eats so we are calling this a win!
customer_reviews.author: Avocado

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pyrs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my Pyredoodle so he didn't have to eat food off the floor. The bowls are the perfect size and it's just the right height. I'm so impressed, I just ordered a second one for my Great Pyrenees who has something holding his bowl off the ground already but I just love this one so much and I think both boys will like not sharing a water bowl anymore :D Best to have it against a wall as it's not heavy and will tip easily. Anything that's tall is likely to do that so it doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to reach for both of us
customer_reviews.text: I use this for a full-grown male German Shepard. It's easy to reach for both of us, the perfect height to not bend over so far and for him to stand with good alignment while eating. The hand holds on both sides make it convenient to move if needed. The only thing I dislike (not a make or break kinda thing) is the water will collect in the small depression - which allows you to place to bowl into the holder without just dropping it in. Perhaps a milliliter of water. But the small depression area is helpful when placing the bowl down so overall 5-stars
customer_reviews.author: Ericaamazon

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome for my German shepherd That had surgery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bowl for my German Shepherd after her hip surgery so she wouldn’t have to bend over. The bowl is great they are deep and hold a lot of food and very sturdy. You do have to be careful if you take the water bowl out and add water, Not to spill it when you put the ball back in the hole. Other than that I really like this product it definitely does it’s job
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Would buy another, slightly shorter one
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our hospice foster dog who doesn't see very well and has balance issues. It is surprisingly sturdy for how light it is. He can definitely see this and is much more excited about food. It is about three inches too tall for our old guy (he can reach it, use it, just can't get food in the bowl on the side closest to him) but I haven't been able to find a reasonably priced replacement that looks as sturdy as this does.
customer_reviews.author: Prudence

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Would give it 5 stars, buuut the legs are VERY flimsy. I would not consider this for energetic dogs because of they bump or play around it, it WILL break. The bowls are nice and HUGE though! Perfect for my 70pound 6 month old Doberman!! :) so big I can put a sufficient amount of water in his bowl too. It's perfect height, very modern and stylish, has rubber bowl silencers to stop the annoying tin sound of the bowls, keeps my dog from puking & farting 24/7, and best of all too is he stops getting his dog food EVERYWHERE! Water..different story, had to get a different bowl for that. Great addition to my house
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall this is a decent feeding station
customer_reviews.text: The height of this is perfect for our 140lb mastiff. The body of it is nicely made and seems to be good quality. There are two reasons that I marked it down one star. First, the bowls are so flimsy that the weight of the water causes the bottom to bow out and second, it takes some finness to set the bowl down in the hole in such a way that it seats correctly and doesn't slosh out.
customer_reviews.author: Tech

customer_reviews.title: My old gal loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I've got an almost 10 year old pit lab mix. She's getting a little stiff and I found that she was having a hard time getting all the way to the ground to eat and drink. I wanted to get something to get the food closer to her chin. This is a perfect height for her! The stand is sturdy and even when she's extra hungry and really getting carried away it never moves even a little. This think is great and when my new pup gets full size I think I'll buy a second one for her to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For My Lab
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my older lab and he loves it. I did place it on carpet, so I do not have any problems with it skidding, although I did notice that it came with little skid guards to place on the bottom that I did not use. My lab is older and going blind, and he was having trouble with the food and water dish we were using that was lower to the floor, so he seems to do way better with this. These bowls are nice and big and I find myself not having to fill his water bowl as often.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my large Shepard mix.
customer_reviews.text: My Roomba used to raise havoc with the dog dishes. Not anymore. No assembly required. Arrived in a huge box. I just had to wash the bowls. It's the perfect height and my dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Tall enough for my Goldendoodle
customer_reviews.text: This bowl set is high enough off the ground for my very tall Goldendoodle. He no longer needs to bend all the way down to the floor to eat or drink. He loves it! It is a very large set, so make sure you have room for it before purchasing. The bowls are huge!
customer_reviews.author: Adelle

customer_reviews.title: The height was perfect. My dog is about 2 1/2 feet tall
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. It did have sticker residue. My dog is a german shepherd and was a little afraid of it at first but gradually got used to it. It really helps because she drinks a lot of water and I holds around a 1/2 gallon of water. I wish the food bowl was shallower because it would promote overfeeding if you don't measure it out. The height was perfect. My dog is about 2 1/2 feet tall.
customer_reviews.author: amaKat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dining Stand
customer_reviews.text: Our 85 pound Labradoodle always appeared uncomfortable to me while eating. Even tho we had an elevated double feeder, he still seemed to labor bending over. The Petmate EZ Reach works as advertised. It is high enough so that our dog doesn't have to bend over too far to access food or water. And the metal bowls were large enough to accommodate the ceramic dishes we had been using. Good value for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Took forever to get here!
customer_reviews.text: So ordered this because the price was awesome, it was either order it here or buy it at a local pet store for $40. It took three weeks to finally get here, and I was annoyed with the tape that they used to hold the bowl in. It’s impossible to clean the residual adhesive stuck to the stainless steel bowl. Our dog is unimpressed but I’m sure it’ll grow on him. I’m happy, it’s the same thing as what what we would have gotten at the pet store but cheaper. Just annoyed with how long it took to get here. I ordered this August 17th and I just got it today, September 6th.
customer_reviews.author: Chantz Zalewski

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my great danes and absolutely love them! They are easy to clean, they come with stainless steel bowls. I was not a fan of the tape used and had to get some goo gone to remove all of it. It came already assembled. I have recommended this to many people who have purchased it and will continue to recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my father for his German Shepard. Its a great size (it comes up high enough) and I only wish I seen this before spending the money on the one I got. Although, it came in an extremely huge box which was not necessary but it was funny because everyone at home was wondering what it was lol.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Masters

customer_reviews.title: Now my elderly golden is drinking more water
customer_reviews.text: Until we got this elevated feeder, we hadn't realized our 72 pound Golden Retriever was limiting his water intake. Almost immediately after getting this, he's started drinking more. Obviously, he enjoys the height. The feeder is fairly sturdy and quite attractive. The bowls are huge but easy to get in and out of the feeder - and I don't have to bend over as much either!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend if you have a medium to large dog/s
customer_reviews.text: Our beloved dog, Bear loves this Pet Diner so much. He is a flat coated retriever, 55lbs. We got X Large size. This tray is perfect hight and it prevents neck injury for sure. Also, I saw a reviewer said to put a weight or two underneath to prevent slippering, that worked out perfectly. 1. Good for medium to large breed dogs 2. Make sure to put something heavy underneath to prevent slippering. ALL IS GOOD!
customer_reviews.author: TJ & Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my masiff/boxer mix
customer_reviews.text: Bought about 2 months ago. Great height for my dog. She seems to enjoy it. It makes me feel better than she doesn't have to bend all the way over to eat, it looks much more comfortable. Came just as advertised. The bowls are great and the little dog bone on the side is incredibly cute. It is very light so there are times that she could nudge t around but it has never tipped over or anything like that. It was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: andrea k.

customer_reviews.title: Bowls not made in USA.
customer_reviews.text: Love how big it is. Perfect for my shepherds. And the bowls are plenty big so I’m not filling water every half hour. My biggest complaints are that the stand is made in USA but the bowls are not. Also they give you some cushion tabs to stick in the rim but they don’t stay on. The sticky tape used to keep bowls in place for shipping left residue that was hard to remove. If the bowls were made in USA it would have been 5 star worthy.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like to wait a while to leave reviews to make sure I love the product and I love it. I have a 100lb. American Bulldog and she's a sloppy drinker who sticks her whole face in the bowl, blows bubbles and then slurps up water. The bowls are easy to remove from the holder and fit snug back in so they aren't shifting around. The bowls don't rust around the underside of the rims like many others I've had. Easy to put together and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Custom Jawns

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This should be a 5 star rating but only giving it a 3 because the manufacturer used tape on the inside of bowl that is so stuck, it's still inside even after scrubbing and many runs through dishwasher. We feed raw food, so it very important that bowls are very clean, and with this tape stuck, I feel it's a hiding place for bacteria. Otherwise bowls are perfect, stand is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: bruce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size for my dog. He is a Doberman/shepherd and very tall (100lbs). The bowl lines up with his natural head length height from the floor. He doesn’t have to bend his neck at all. The whole unit looks very large.. reminds me of a low bench or foot stool...lol but it’s perfect for him. Very sturdy, durable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with this
customer_reviews.text: This is great for our aging yellow lab, who needed a raised bowl. The cat loves to climb up there too, even though he has a bowl on the floor. I knocked off a star because while the unit is perfectly proportioned and easy to keep clean, the legs are slightly flexible, which means that if it gets knocked into or swiped with a tail it splashes some water out of the water bowl. It would never tip over, but it bounces around a bit if knocked into.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good height
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect height for my great dane. It is wobbly so I did put it against a wall. He eats fast and hard so I did not want it to fall apart while he was eating out it. I put water in one side and food in the other. Good sized bowls. I will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: A. Chaffer

customer_reviews.title: and I purchased this "diner" so he could drink more comfortably. I was hoping that it would fit in ...
customer_reviews.text: We have an older St. Bernard, and I purchased this "diner" so he could drink more comfortably. I was hoping that it would fit in the tray I also purchased, but the tray was an inch or so too small. If you know Saints, they are not the neatest when it comes to eating and drinking, so I set his water bowl inside of the metal bowl that comes with this stand, and there's a little less water on the floor when he drinks. Wish I'd found this when he was younger.
customer_reviews.author: MonaLeesa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this and so do i. They prefer to eat from this instead of the bowl on the ground. For medium- large dogs
customer_reviews.author: Ashtlynn b.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 month old German Shepherd & he seems to love it. It's very sturdy & of great height. Comes with rubber grips to stick on the inside edges of the stand so that the bowls don't clang when your dog acts like they've never eaten before. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Pamelala

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I purchased this product. I have two huge greyhounds and with their long necks they can stand almost upright and eat. The plastic holder is very sturdy and the bowls wash up nicely and can be run through the dishwasher. I ordered two sets of these - one per dog. I keep fresh water in one bowl and their food in the other. The feeder stays put and does not move around on the tile floor and if they ever wear out (unlikely) or I ever get another dog (more likely than the feeder wearing out), I will repurchase. They are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Reader

customer_reviews.title: very cheaply mad
customer_reviews.text: item is very cheaply made = I have the smaller version which is also cheap but the smaller dogs don't push it over. I bout the xtra large for my English Setter - (50lb) she just knocks it over when she eats..... plus they tape in the bowls so now the bowls have a sticky spot. Not impressed - will be throwing this away....
customer_reviews.author: KAO

customer_reviews.title: One of the best things I’ve bought my pup
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this because I was worried my dog would knock it over or not even use it but it’s been amazing. I had noticed my golden retriever had been coughing and gagging during and after he would eat and I read up on how eating food at ground level wasn’t good for their digestion. Now he only eats at the shoulder height and it makes it easier for me now to have to bend down as far!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: 11 week old German Shepherd figured out how to flip bowl...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in hope that my German Shepherd would not be able to flip his water bowl. On day 2, my 11 week old GS puppy figured out how to flip the bowls. It ended up making a huge mess on my Pergo floors. I had no choice but to return it... Nice concept but the overall design needs some work.
customer_reviews.author: Ash B.

customer_reviews.title: Great stand, great price
customer_reviews.text: Very light and sturdy. XL perfect size for my 95 lb Alaskan Malamute. Bowls a tad bit shallow and wide; suppose I could have gone a size down, but the height is spot on. Easy to clean up, though the stand has only one depression on the edge of each bowl drop in slot, so it can be difficult to get the bowl out if it still has a lot of water in it. Manufacturer should have put two depressions for your fingers and would have made it perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great feeder for large dogs
customer_reviews.text: A great feeder for large dogs. The dishes are generous which is great for the water... had to fill the old one more often. Description says i can break this down but the black "legs" do not come off so. I was using it to travel with so it was a little inconvenient. For a permanent, at home feeder, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Baskerville

customer_reviews.title: Taller than most elevated feeders but does have flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Dual bowls that are large capacity Easy to clean Elevated higher than most overpriced feeders No rattle design ledges make it silent! Cons: Grooves for easy bowl placement collect water Lightweight so it can be tipped over accidentally Overall worth the price. I ended up putting a brick behind the legs to ensure it doesn't tip over again.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: My Great Dane loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This raised dog bowl set is amazing. I purchased thus set to replace an old wood one my Great Dane used. The large 10" bowls that are included, are perfect size to hold plenty of water to keep my furbaby hydrated, and also big enough to hold plenty of food. The set has the perfect amount of raise off the floor to keep Pippi from having to reach to low while getting food and water. The bowls pop out very easily for easy cleaning each day. With bone shaped handles cut into the sides, carrying the while feeder is of extreme ease as well. The unit is sturdy and well manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: Matthias

customer_reviews.title: Bowl started to rust
customer_reviews.text: Overall the product seemed to be more than adequate but the bowl we used for water started to rust. It was located inside the house in a temperature controlled environment. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Santamedic

customer_reviews.title: my great dane mix actually eats over his bowl now
customer_reviews.text: my great dane mix actually eats over his bowl now!! he used to grab food and bring it to the living room floor to eat but now he stays in the kitchen over his bowl. i was worried about his stomach flipping from having a low bowl so we got this. my chihuahua has 2 small bowls underneath this stand so she can have her own. the little black rubber pieces to hold the bowls in place don’t stay on well but that’s not a big problem for me
customer_reviews.author: courtney lucas

customer_reviews.title: pretty great
customer_reviews.text: It's HUGE, bigger than we thought but we should have read the numbers measurements. No complaints though, just bigger than we thought. Anyhow, it's super cute and the dog bowls are HUGE- which is why we got this for our dog. our dog is 20 inches tall. We got this big of one for the bowls to be big, so we didn't have to keep refilling the water. pretty satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Nicoleg123

customer_reviews.title: Not for large breed dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this diner for my st. Bernard and I wouldn't call the diner an XL - it's flimsy and very light/thin - unless it's against a wall - it easily tips over. I would not recommend this for use for a large breed dog.
customer_reviews.author: zack

customer_reviews.title: Our perfect dog feeder.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for our newly rescued dog. It is the correct height so she does not have to lean over to get the food and the water is nearby, so she can eat and then drink. Very fair price since and was cheaper than me building a wooden stand and buying the stainless steel dishes to fit.
customer_reviews.author: The Duck

customer_reviews.title: Works well for giant breed dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but it is a bit flimsy for very aggressive eaters. I had to drill holes to not have a puddle of water where you're supposed to put your fingers to pick up the dishes. I little problematic to clean for some. The water bowl are nice and big and well made although not too thick.
customer_reviews.author: Roni Weaver-Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice dog bowl/stand combo
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking dog bowl and stand... I didn’t realize how big the dishes were until we received it today and then I re-read the description. Our pups food looks itty-bitty in the bowl as I ordered the x-large one. She would’ve been good with the medium sized stand... she is a 65 lb pit bull and reaches it just fine but the bowls look funny because they are so large.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect (Size XL ) for our 120 lbs Cane Corso Italian Mastiff
customer_reviews.text: It arrived right on time for breakfast! Already assembled except for the little foam rubber tapes that add extra seating security and helps control the rattling of the two nice sized metal bowls. Matches our color schemes perfectly. Perfect (Size XL ) for our 120 lbs Cane Corso Italian Mastiff!!
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Honestly, I didn’t expect this dog dish set to be so nice. I really like the height of it as well as the color. The price was so good I didn’t expect the quality to be so good but it was.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Del Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I realized but it’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: It’s larger than I expected, guess my half husky is smaller than the husky in the image! But it’s great. Came in a huge box already assembled. Sturdy and seems like great quality. Bowls don’t move around.
customer_reviews.author: Fam

customer_reviews.title: light but sturdy, good height and construction. works great!
customer_reviews.text: it's bigger than what I needed but was a really great deal and I think the large size of the bowl keeps my dog from dropping food on the floor. Nice height, easy to get bowls out, sturdy and not easily knocked over. I would recommend this product (I have a 60lb boxer and she likes it).
customer_reviews.author: happy gilmore

customer_reviews.title: its ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: Dish holder is OK at best but for the money it does the job good. Comes with 2 stainless dishes. Not to sturdy of a dish but does the job ok. I have 2 Newfoundlands and it works good.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Horn

customer_reviews.title: My GREAT DANE LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: My great dane was given to us as our friends family member could no longer care for him, after several attempts at different types of food and water bowls, would not get him to eat/drink as if he were afraid of the other bowls...after purchasing this set, HE LOVES IT! The price was also better than anywhere else. THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Could be slightly higher
customer_reviews.text: Our Bernese Mountain dog is about 30-31in tall, so it would be nice if it was just little higher. But, otherwise i like the big bowls, although his food amount looks tiny in it:-) for the ones that do not measure their food, end up overfeeding very easily. Seems sturdy so far and looks nice and neat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's really big!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it's design but, alas, it was too big for our space so I returned it. If you have space for it, you'll like it's shape, size, and ease of removing dishes for cleaning. It was a perfect height for my doberman--just too wide for me.
customer_reviews.author: FlickRN3

customer_reviews.title: Good quality/ durability
customer_reviews.text: We have a 70 lb bernedoodle, and the bowls were just the right height for her. I would not recommended if your dog is on the shorter size for their breed. They are very durable, and are sturdy for dogs who like to charge their food and water bowls. The space underneath is great for storing towels for those dogs that dribble their water across the floor with their chin hairs. Overall would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheep Bowls
customer_reviews.text: The stand is fine the bowls not there paper thin and they have stickers in the bottom of the bowl really hard to get out ended up going out to buy new bowls. can't recemend
customer_reviews.author: Carm

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean and the right height for my dog
customer_reviews.text: This is the right height for my 90# lab. The dishes are not the best quality and though I've had the feeder for a few months, there is still some adhesive from the stickers on the bowls. It's easy to wash the dishes and wipe the plastic down. Overall, a good product for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Ski

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great product so far. Been using for about a week for our 70lb pittbull. She has shoved it with her nose and it hasn't fallen over. Only complaint I have it the tape they use to hold bowls in while in shipping is hard to get residue off. We purchased the 8inch one.
customer_reviews.author: Meanjean

customer_reviews.title: Great bowl, horrible packing
customer_reviews.text: I have 10-year-old one of these I love (and still is fine, just needed another). The new one is exactly like it, great right?1?! This thing was taped with LOTS of packing tape over something scotch type tape. While removing all the packing tape was time-consuming, it came off. The smaller taper underneath all of the packing tape does not come off the interior of the bowls no matter what I do. Even Go B Gone doesn't get rid of it. Dishwasher on high heat, nope. Razor blade removes the tape but not the residue.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, just a little too big to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, just a little too big to use right now. Definitely for a full grown 50+ lb dog. But our pup will be getting lots of use out of it soon. Height will be perfect and the stainless steel bowls are nice and large.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer p

customer_reviews.title: High enough for a big dog bowls big enough for plenty of food and water
customer_reviews.text: I watch my daughters 60 lb lab 3 days a week I have a little Shih zu This is perfect for the lab this way he goes straight to this feeder high enough for him keeps water and food neat lightweight dogbone cut outs perfect to pick up so I can store in closet when not using only complaint is the bowls seem very light and flimsy don't know how long it will last hopefully will not get rusty Great for the price
customer_reviews.author: max's mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height.Large bowls
customer_reviews.text: With 2 huskies we ordered 2. They are the perfect height. They hold a good amount of water. Still have to refill at least 2x per day but that keeps the water fresh. Not so sure about the lifespan on the bowls the metal seems thin. 4 stars for now... will upgrade or downgrade after a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Best elevated dog bowl feeder for large dogs
customer_reviews.text: Feeder arrived assembled in a large box. Quality is great, sturdy, substantial plastic with extra large stainless steel bowls. Its great for our 8 month old golden doodle.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice side effect for him and us - the extra ...
customer_reviews.text: My Chow is 13 years old, and was hunched over every morning and evening gobbling at his food. Measured him from floor to chin and then ordered this dish. Comes right to below his chin, so no more hunching. Also, he doesn't gobble anymore either. Nice side effect for him and us - the extra air from gobbling came out as gas later on!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Beck

customer_reviews.title: Just okay!
customer_reviews.text: The product came in a box 5 times the size of the product, and seems okay. Very flimsy sides. My compaint is the tape film stuck all over the bowls from the tape. I scrubbed and scrubbed and if won’t come off. We will see how long this lasts !
customer_reviews.author: Mckayla

customer_reviews.title: This was a great solution- the only reason this is not receiving 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a solution to the problem of our dog picking up her food bowl and throwing it. This was a great solution- the only reason this is not receiving 5 stars is because we wish the stand was a little heavier so when our dogs run up to it they didn't knock water out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen and Joe Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Petmate EZ Reach Diner
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect height, size, color and style. Our standard poodle seems happy with her Petmate EZ Reach Diner. She is very skiddish of everything but she went right up to this dog feeder and started eating out of it right a way. It shipped super fast to our house. We are very happy with this purchase. Thank You!!!
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought
customer_reviews.text: This is worth the price. It's sturdy and looks great. I got the large. It would be great for a St Bernard or great dane. My border/ lab loves it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Carrier

customer_reviews.title: Good height for my Texas Lacy but medium would probably ...
customer_reviews.text: Good height for my Texas Lacy but medium would probably worked a little better but it is a great fit for the German Shepherd. I drilled some small holes in the thumb wells for drainage because they would fill up with water from the dogs drinking I keep it over a mat so water on the floor is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: reeac

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Its a great height for my 140 pound Rottweiler, but it's just not real sturdy. I had a very nice feeder, but had to purchase another one due to his allergies to the plastic bowls. This one isn't so sturdy. But it will have to do for now, I will look into a mat for underneath it as it slides on the tile floor.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D

customer_reviews.title: Ugly but functional.
customer_reviews.text: Large size is very large and bulky looking. Bowls are nice size for large dogs. Serves its purpose but not very attractive. Overall good product so far.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Like it but somewhat flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my husky. I notice that she eats more now that her food is propped up. Very easy to clean and the dishes are very big. I only wish that the plastic was a little more durable. It seemed flimsy when it came in the package. and the little stick on bumpers came off after a couple weeks, but honestly, I don't think I even needed them. The bowls don't even move around that much to make a noise. I would recommend this product definitely
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: We realized our dog had to bend down so much to eat or drink from her bowls so we looked around for something like this. We got it in and its great, perfect height for our dog so she doesnt have to strain, and less choking on water.
customer_reviews.author: Blade

customer_reviews.title: GREAT.
customer_reviews.text: Love this item, ordered the 8 cup black n beige. My 12 yr old Labrador loves it!!!! It comes with extra stick on grips so the bowls do NOT slide around as you dog is trying to get the very last of the special stuff you added to their food. (coconut n greek yogurt or coconut n pumpkin).
customer_reviews.author: BRIGITTE WALKER

customer_reviews.title: Great dog dishes
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted & affordable. Dog had no problem getting used to it. Worried he would flip them over but no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Donna O.

customer_reviews.title: OMWord it is big and nice.
customer_reviews.text: OMGoodness, it is big! It came in a huge box. It is definitely the max size for my large dog to reach in to eat. I am very pleased with the construction, sturdiness, and design. The bowls are independently removable. I am glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Mer

customer_reviews.title: 125lbs German Shepherd/Lab Mix loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I kept noticing that my dog was laying down to eat her food. Apparently, bending down to the bowl was to strenuous. So, I bought this for my tall Princess. My 125lbs German Shepherd/Lab Mix loved it and drank and ate within 2 mins. Of course she had to sniff it first. Perfect size, height and all.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for us!
customer_reviews.text: This dog bowl is adorable. I needed a taller bowl for my Schnauzer that was having a hard time eating from a bowl on the floor. The 10" height was exactly right for her. My only minor complaint is that the bowls don't sit quite right in the holes. I made sure the rubber bumpers were set in right, but the bowls still don't seat as I would expect. Not a big enough issue for me to knock the rating. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Smith

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: It is higher than I expected but dog has no issue using it at all. It looks nice and very easy to remove the bowls and clean then. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tanvia

customer_reviews.title: Great for our big dog
customer_reviews.text: We have a 100lb shephard/mastiff mix. This is a good height for him. It seems stable and sturdy. No problems with dog (or kids) tipping it or spilling. I do have to refill the water bowl pretty often but I would still purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: USBabyTech

customer_reviews.title: Love it! My dog enjoys eating up high
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My dog enjoys eating up high, now he can walk away from it and his little sister can't eat his food. He is a German Short hair and it is the perfect height for large breeds. I have it on placemats and it does not slide around, and the smaller dog's bowl is underneath. Ordering another one for my " grandson".
customer_reviews.author: pam kinzel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my dog with sore shoulders
customer_reviews.text: This is really helping my senior dog. He has arthritis in his shoulders & it hurts him to bend down to the floor to eat! He loves his new feeder! I have a boxer & the extra large was a great height & size for him.
customer_reviews.author: N. Doan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We just received this today. So far, I love it! It is up against a wall so I don't see having issues with it tipping over. I like the space underneath it too - we can keep toys or a toter under there. We purchased the extra large it is right at our labs chin, it's very tall. It also comes with pieces to help the bowls not making a clinking noise when they are eating or drinking.
customer_reviews.author: JBanks

customer_reviews.title: great height for him
customer_reviews.text: Big bowls... my boy loves it 110 lb Rhodesian Ridgeback, great height for him. The bowls don’t rattle at all and sit perfectly in their holes which are open through the bottom, the plastic is a little lighter weight than I thought but it’s great overall same quality as what you may get buy at the store.
customer_reviews.author: brooke T

customer_reviews.title: Great for large dogs
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our 85# Labradoodle, as when he'd drink from a bowl set pon the floor he'd invariably start barfing water after a couple minutes. Now there's no indication he's doing that any longer since he drinks with his head held higher.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Cats can't tip this over!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our dog. We had to buy this because our one cat loves to tip over water bowls. This does the job and the darn cat can't tip over the bowl. He hasn't figured out there's water in the bowl so that kinda throws off this review. Wish us luck.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cute boxer that is a slobbery mess. Before having this lifted dog bowls, my boxer would drip water and get food EVERYWHERE!!!! After having this item for only just a day, I noticed that there was less water and no food anywhere. I have had it for a few months and am so happy that I bought it. If you have a medium or large size dog, this is a must. So glad with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Wake

customer_reviews.title: Great for water bowls for taller, bigger pups.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for water for our three heeler mixes. It's great! The bowls are huge and it stands tall enough that all of our pups aren't bending over to drink. Very sturdy and easy to clean. I like that there is nothing under the bowls for spilled water to collect in.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley P.

customer_reviews.title: Petmate EX Reach Diner
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, light, but stable on the floor, I had mine on a rubber mat which kept it in it's place. The bowls were of good quality and fit perfectly in the holes, no clanging around. However, it was a little to tall for my small female German Shepherd by about 2 inches. She seemed to be stretching a bit to get into her feed bowl so I unfortunately had to return it. Great off-the-floor feeding unit if you have a larger dog!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela N.

customer_reviews.title: My dog is a happy camper again.
customer_reviews.text: My dog enjoys eating again because this item is tall enough and the base is plastic. Her last one was metal and freaked her out when her tags clanked against it when she ate. She is calm and happy with this new one. It's also easy to clean .
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: Nice tall dog dish
customer_reviews.text: Light weight but it is perfect for my Lab mix. He is a big dog and this is the right size for him. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Greenebeane

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: I was initially afraid that this was going to be too tall for my dog (pit bull/dalmatian mix), but it is the perfect size for him! Also, it is tall enough that it has deterred him from raking his food onto the floor.
customer_reviews.author: TS92

product_meta.title: Petmate Easy Reach Pet Diner Elevated Dog Bowls 2 Sizes 2 Polished Colors
product_meta.description:
Size:LargeThe Pet mate Easy Reach Pet Diner provides a comfortable option for pets to drink and eat without stooping. The dog feeding station keeps dog bowls elevated, allowing pets to reach their bowls without neck-strain. The tall dog bowl stand is sturdy for extended use; rubber inserts beneath each stainless steel dog bowl prevent the stand from squeaking as pet eat. The raised rims around each spill proof dog bowl prevent mess around the bottom of the dog food stand. The stainless steel bowls are removable and dishwasher safe for easy cleaning. Bone cutouts on both sides provide designated spots pet parents to easily pick up and carry the stand. The Easy Reach dog feeders are available in two sizes, including Medium and Extra Large, to accommodate a wide range of pets. "Black" and "Pearl Tan" colors allow easy placement in any room of the home.

AMAZON.COM


PETMATE 23479 EASY REACH PET DINER, BLACK/PEARL TAN
Meet dogs at their level with the Easy Reach Diner elevated feeding & watering unit! Any dog will benefit from the improved digestion that comes from eating in a comfortable position, & older dogs will appreciate how easy it is on their joints. &, with removable bowls for easy cleaning, the Easy Reach Diner is a win for pets & pet parents alike

 * Recessed area makes it easy for pet parents to remove the bowls

 * Recessed area makes it easy for pet parents to remove the bowls
 * Elevated, spill-free rims help to keep water & food where they belong
 * No more bowl rattling, thanks to rubber inserts that reduce noise & keep bowls in place
 * Bone-shaped cutouts on the side lend practical style, giving pet parents handles for easy lifting
 * Bowls are dishwasher safe
feature_bullets: NO DISCOMFORT: The extra large elevated dog bowls are perfect for large dog breeds & older pets. Prevents pets from straining or bending their necks while eating or drinking. Raised bowl rims prevent spillage.
IDEAL FOR LARGE PETS: The large dog feeding station holds 12 cups of food in each bowl and the durable BPA-free plastic provides strong support. Stainless steel water & food bowls dishwasher-safe.

FOOD & WATER: Keep pets fed with fresh food & water with a variety of our products. Check out our airtight dry food storage containers, bowls for kennels, gravity water bowls, automated food bowls & travel accessories.

Petmate: For over 50 years, we at Petmate are passionate about our dogs, cats & furry friends in general. Starting with the very first dog kennel, we've produced plenty of eco-friendly products that pets will love.

JUST FOR PETS: Petmate makes a variety of pet products for dogs, cats, chickens & other small furry friends! Check out our brands such as Aspen Pet, Arm & Hammer, Booda, Chuckit!, Jackson Galaxy & more!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
